docs.lead_paragraph: Following are excerpts from President Clinton's news conference yesterday, as recorded by The New York Times: Prepared Statement First, let me say that we all know that we are in the midst of the longest and strongest economic expansion in our history, with nearly 21 million new jobs, unemployment at 4 percent and solid income growth across all income groups.

headline.main: Excerpts from Clinton's Comments at Wide-Ranging News Conference

docs.abstract: Excerpts from Pres Clinton's news conference (L)
